message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%.  We can work on a better deal later.
That's not how this works, Alice.  How about a more reasonable split? 70/30
Okay, let's try a 60/40 split.  I'm willing to compromise, but I think my contribution deserves a larger share.
Alice, inflation is eating away at this deal. 60/40 is my final offer.  Take it or leave it.
